panels.title: Laser bias current on client ports ($NCS1002)

targets.query: SELECT distinct("pre-fec-ber__average") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-seSELECT distinct("pre-fec-ber__average") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-second30fecs/otu-second30fec" WHERE "Producer" =~ /^$NCS1002$/ AND "name" =~ /./ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)cond30fecs/otu-second30fec" WHERE "Producer" =~ /^$NCS1002$/ AND "name" =~ /./ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT distinct("post-fec-ber__average") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-second30fecs/otu-second30fec" WHERE "Producer" =~ /^$NCS1002$/ AND "name" =~ /./ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)

SELECT distinct("ec-bits__data") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-second30fecs/otu-second30fec" WHERE "Producer" = 'rosco_1' AND "name" = 'CoherentDSP0/0/0/26' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

SELECT distinct("ec-bits__data") FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-second30fecs/otu-second30fec" WHERE "Producer" = 'rosco_1' AND "name" = 'CoherentDSP0/0/0/26' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m)

list.name: NCS1002
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "Cisco-IOS-XR-pmengine-oper:performance-management/otu/otu-ports/otu-port/otu-current/otu-second30/otu-second30fecs/otu-second30fec" WITH KEY="Producer"
